page.title: 18Burgess's
page.content: Situated on the outskirts of Garton is a branch of a national company called Burgess.The business is concerned with agriculture.They sell and repair all kinds of farm machinery.A large stock of spare parts is kept at these premises to service the many types of agricultural machines operating on nearby farms.The other side of the business is a service workshop, manufacturing and domestic sales. Seventeen people are employed, 85% of whom live in the Parish of Garton.They have an open day once a year which is well supported and very popular with children. Trading in the first quarter of the year was extremely buoyant but the Chancellor's budget rather reduced business.
